title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing Trilogy[R.G. Mechanics]
description:
The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing

Year : 2013
Genre : RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : NeocoreGames
Published : NeocoreGames
Language : English/Russian
Tablet : ALI213

System requirements:

> Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
> Processor : Intel Core 2 DUO processor with a clock speed of 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 processor with a clock frequency of 2.7 GHz or better
> RAM : 2 GB
> Video card : 512 Mb
> Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX9
> Free space on hard disk : 20.3 GB

Description :

The game The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing takes place in a dark Gothic world, reminiscent of Europe of the XIX century, but with monsters, magic and fancy technology. In this grim tale, filled with black humor and vivid dialogues, you play the role of the son of the famous hunter Van Helsing - an outstanding hero, endowed with a dark mystery and charm. Your path will lie in Borgovii sinister land where the former mystical enemies called him a hero to the rescue together to defeat a new threat hanging over the cities of Western Europe. Vivid characters, exciting plot and a stunning gothic macabre style of play "The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing" returned to lovers of classic RPG combat in order and send them to a new unforgettable adventure!

Features:

Sign in unforgettable gloomy gothic world filled with monsters, magic and supernatural knowledge.
Immerse yourself in an exciting unique story to tell your own character with grim humor, spiced with brilliant dialogues.
Fight in fierce battles to defeat your supernatural enemies through a variety of talents and skills.
Adapt your character thanks to a careful tier system, in which you can decide which skills you will need in your exploits.
Use special abilities and customize unique skills of the follower.
Release your anger to become even stronger and more sophisticated.
Learn the secrets of the mystical alchemy and invent things that increase your strength.
Arrange comfortably in your den hunting and decorate their shelter various valuable trophies.
Become the greatest fighter of monsters of all time, playing together in a network to hunt monsters with up to four players.

The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II

Year : 2014
Genre : RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : NeocoreGames
Published : NeocoreGames
Language : English/Multi10
Tablet : 3DM

System requirements:

> Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
> Processor : Dual Core 2.0 GHz CPU
> RAM : 2 GB
> Video Card : Nvidia 8800 GT / Intel HD4000 / AMD HD3850
> Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX9
> Free space on hard disk : 25.8 GB

Description :

Game Van Helsing 2: Death Defying (The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II) - is not just a collection of a dozen new maps and monsters, but now continued, preserving the best of the first game. In addition small improvements and dodelok, it also acquired a lot of new features.
And yet ... It's not exactly a feature, but if you like lively dialogues, cheeky humor and "Easter eggs," the first game, then you'll be happy to hear that in the continuation of this even more.

The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing III

Year : 2015
Genre : RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : NeocoreGames
Published : NeocoreGames
Language : English/Multi6
Tablet : ALI213

System requirements:

> Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
> Processor : Dual Core 2.0 GHz CPU
> Memory : 1 GB
> Video Card : DirectX 9.0c-compatible level NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, Intel HD4000 and AMD HD3850
> Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX9
> Free space on hard disk : 23.7 GB

Description :

The civil war in Borgovii over, but the future is still grim. City mystical sciences lies in ruins, the remains of the different fractions gnaw each other's throats for the remaining scraps of power. A wave of terrible events rocked the ground, a former ally turned into a terrible villain, an ancient evil threatens the world of dark Eastern European fantasy.
Van Helsing, the main hero of the final part of the trilogy, will do what he does best - destroy hordes of various evil spirits. Six classes, new possibilities, worlds and monsters - all this awaits the player in The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing III.
